description: This PHP source file implements JWT token verification, including signature validation, token data validation, key fetching from a URL, and utilities for handling public keys, logging, and base64 decoding for URL-safe strings. It appears to be used for OAuth token validation in a web UI context.

methods.name: VerifyToken
methods.description: Main function to verify a JWT token by checking its structure, signature, and validity.

methods.name: VerifySignature
methods.description: Verifies the JWT token signature using the public key fetched from a remote URL or cache.

methods.name: CheckModTimeValid
methods.description: Checks if the cached key file modification time is within a valid time window (4 hours).

methods.name: VerifyTokenData
methods.description: Checks if the token's issued at, not before, and expiration times are valid and if the tenant ID matches.

methods.name: WritePubKey
methods.description: Writes the public key to a file formatted as a certificate.

methods.name: LogTokenData
methods.description: Logs token information or errors to a log file.
